data.title: Biography of Peter IV King Aragon 1319
meta_keywords: Alfonso IV King Aragon Dies Peter IV King Aragon Succeeds
Marriage of Charles II King Navarre and Joan Valois
Charles 'Bad' II King Navarre succeeded by Charles III King Navarre
Peter IV King Aragon Dies John I King Aragon Succeeds
data.meta_description: Biography of Peter IV King Aragon 1319-1387 including his birth, marriages, death and life events, life events of his siblings, and his ancestry to five generations, royal ancestors and royal descendants.
data.text:
Biography of Peter IV King Aragon 1319-1387

Paternal Family Tree: Barcelona

On 05 Sep 1319 Peter IV King Aragon was born to Alfonso IV King Aragon (age 19) and Teresa Enteca Queen Consort Aragon.

On 05 Nov 1327 [his grandfather] James "The Just" II King Aragon (age 60) died. His son [his father] Alfonso IV King Aragon (age 28) succeeded IV King Aragon since his eldest son wished to take holy orders.

In 1328 Alfonso "Avenger" XI King Castile (age 16) and [his future sister-in-law] Maria Burgundy Queen Consort Castile (age 15) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Castile. She the daughter of Alfonso "Brave" IV King Portugal (age 36) and Beatrice Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 35). He the son of Ferdinand IV King Castile IV King Leon and Constance Burgundy Queen Consort Castile Queen Consort Leon. They were double first cousins. He a great x 4 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England. She a great x 4 granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

On 24 Jan 1336 [his father] Alfonso IV King Aragon (age 36) died. His son Peter IV King Aragon (age 16) succeeded IV King Aragon.

On 23 Jul 1338 Peter IV King Aragon (age 18) and Maria Ã‰vreux Queen Consort Aragon (age 9) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. She the daughter of Philip "Noble" III King Navarre (age 32) and Joan Capet II Queen Navarre (age 26). He the son of Alfonso IV King Aragon and Teresa Enteca Queen Consort Aragon. They were third cousin once removed. He a great x 5 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King Henry III of England.

On 24 Aug 1340 [his future brother-in-law] Peter I King Portugal (age 20) and Constanza Manuel Queen Consort Castile (age 24) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Portugal. He the son of Alfonso "Brave" IV King Portugal (age 49) and Beatrice Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 47). They were second cousins. He a great x 4 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England. She a great x 4 granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

In 1343 [his daughter] Constance Barcelona was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 23) and [his wife] Maria Ã‰vreux Queen Consort Aragon (age 14).

On 16 Sep 1343 [his father-in-law] Philip "Noble" III King Navarre (age 37) died. His son [his brother-in-law] Charles "Bad" II King Navarre (age 10) succeeded II King Navarre.

On 07 Nov 1344 [his daughter] Joanna Barcelona was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 25) and [his wife] Maria Ã‰vreux Queen Consort Aragon (age 15).

In 1345 [his daughter] Maria Barcelona was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 25) and [his wife] Maria Ã‰vreux Queen Consort Aragon (age 16).

On 08 Jan 1345 Philip Duke Valois (age 8) and [his sister-in-law] Blanche Ã‰vreux Queen Consort France (age 14) were married. She the daughter of Philip "Noble" III King Navarre and Joan Capet II Queen Navarre (age 32). He the son of King Philip "Fortunate" VI of France (age 51) and Joan "Lame" Burgundy Queen Consort France (age 51). They were first cousin once removed. He a great x 4 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King Henry III of England.

In 1347 [his wife] Maria Ã‰vreux Queen Consort Aragon (age 18) died.

On 28 Apr 1347 [his son] Peter Barcelona was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 27) and [his former wife] Maria Ã‰vreux Queen Consort Aragon.

On 15 Nov 1347 Peter IV King Aragon (age 28) and Eleanor Burgundy Queen Consort Aragon (age 19) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. She the daughter of Alfonso "Brave" IV King Portugal (age 56) and Beatrice Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 54). He the son of Alfonso IV King Aragon and Teresa Enteca Queen Consort Aragon. They were second cousins. He a great x 5 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England. She a great x 4 granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

In 1348 [his wife] Eleanor Burgundy Queen Consort Aragon (age 20) died.

On 27 Aug 1349 Peter IV King Aragon (age 29) and Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Aragon were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. He the son of Alfonso IV King Aragon and Teresa Enteca Queen Consort Aragon. They were second cousins. He a great x 5 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England. She a great x 5 granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

In or before 1350 [his former brother-in-law] Peter I King Portugal (age 29) and InÃªs Castro (age 24) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Portugal. There is some uncertainty as to whether they were married. He announced their marriage in 1357 after he succeeded, and after her death, thereby ensuring their children were legitimate. He the son of Alfonso "Brave" IV King Portugal (age 58) and Beatrice Ivrea Queen Consort Portugal (age 56). He a great x 4 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

On 11 Jan 1350 King Philip "Fortunate" VI of France (age 56) and [his former sister-in-law] Blanche Ã‰vreux Queen Consort France (age 19) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort of France. The difference in their ages was 37 years. She the daughter of Philip "Noble" III King Navarre and Joan Capet II Queen Navarre. He the son of Charles Valois I Count Valois and Margaret Capet Countess Valois. They were half first cousin once removed. He a great x 4 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King Henry III of England.

On 27 Dec 1350 [his son] King John I of Aragon was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 31) and [his wife] Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Aragon. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.45%.

On 12 Feb 1352 [his former brother-in-law] Charles "Bad" II King Navarre (age 19) and Joan Valois Queen Consort Navarre (age 8) were married at Chateau du Vivie, Coutevroult. She by marriage Queen Consort Navarre. She the daughter of King John "The Good" II of France (age 32) and Bonne Luxemburg Queen Consort France. He the son of Philip "Noble" III King Navarre and Joan Capet II Queen Navarre. They were second cousins. He a great x 3 grandson of King Henry III of England. She a great x 5 granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

On 29 Jul 1356 [his son] Martin I King Aragon was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 36) and [his wife] Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Aragon. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.45%.

On 18 Jan 1357 [his former sister-in-law] Maria Burgundy Queen Consort Castile (age 44) died.

On 28 May 1357 [his former father-in-law] Alfonso "Brave" IV King Portugal (age 66) died. His son [his former brother-in-law] Peter I King Portugal (age 37) succeeded I King Portugal.

On 20 Feb 1358 [his daughter] Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Castile was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 38) and [his wife] Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Aragon. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.45%.

In Jun 1362 [his son] Alfonso Barcelona was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 42) and [his wife] Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Aragon. Coefficient of inbreeding 2.45%.

In 1363 [his former brother-in-law] Philip Ã‰vreux Count Longueville (age 27) died.

On 18 Jan 1367 [his former brother-in-law] Peter I King Portugal (age 46) died. His son Ferdinand I King Portugal (age 21) succeeded I King Portugal.

On 24 Jun 1373 [his son] King John I of Aragon (age 22) and [his daughter-in-law] Martha Armagnac Queen Consort Aragon (age 26) were married at Barcelona. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. She the daughter of John I Count Armagnac (deceased) and Beatrice Clermont Countess Armagnac. He the son of Peter IV King Aragon (age 53) and Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Aragon.

In 1376 [his illegitimate son] Alfonso Barcelona was born illegitimately to Peter IV King Aragon (age 56) and [his future wife] Sibia Fortia Queen Consort Aragon.

On 11 Oct 1377 Peter IV King Aragon (age 58) and Sibia Fortia Queen Consort Aragon were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. He the son of Alfonso IV King Aragon and Teresa Enteca Queen Consort Aragon. He a great x 5 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

In Apr 1379 [his son] Peter Barcelona was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 59) and [his wife] Sibia Fortia Queen Consort Aragon.

Before 04 Oct 1379 [his son-in-law] John I King Castile (age 21) and [his daughter] Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Castile (age 21) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Castile. She the daughter of Peter IV King Aragon (age 60) and Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Aragon. He the son of Henry "Fratricide" II King Castile and Juana Manuel Queen of Castile (age 40). They were third cousin once removed. He a great x 5 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

In 1380 [his daughter] Isabella Barcelona was born to Peter IV King Aragon (age 60) and [his wife] Sibia Fortia Queen Consort Aragon.

On 02 Feb 1380 [his son] King John I of Aragon (age 29) and [his daughter-in-law] Yolande of Bar Queen Consort Aragon (age 15) were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. She the daughter of Robert of Bar 1st Duke of Bar (age 35) and Marie Valois Duchess Bar (age 35). He the son of Peter IV King Aragon (age 60) and Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Aragon. They were third cousin once removed. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King Edward I of England.

On 13 Sep 1382 [his daughter] Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Castile (age 24) died.

On 01 Jan 1387 [his former brother-in-law] Charles "Bad" II King Navarre (age 54) died. His son Charles III King Navarre (age 26) succeeded III King Navarre. Eleanor of Castile Queen Consort Navarre (age 24) by marriage Queen Consort Navarre.

On 06 Jan 1387 Peter IV King Aragon (age 67) died. His son [his son] King John I of Aragon (age 36) succeeded I King Aragon.

On 24 Nov 1406 [his former wife] Sibia Fortia Queen Consort Aragon died at Barcelona. She had a state funeral. She was buried in the convent of San Francisco (Framenors) in Barcelona.

[his son] Martin I King Aragon and Maria Luna Queen Consort Aragon were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. He the son of Peter IV King Aragon and Eleanor Barcelona Queen Consort Aragon.

[his father] Alfonso IV King Aragon and Eleanor Ivrea Queen Consort Aragon were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. She the daughter of Ferdinand IV King Castile IV King Leon and Constance Burgundy Queen Consort Castile Queen Consort Leon. He the son of James "The Just" II King Aragon and Blanche Capet Queen Consort Aragon. They were first cousin once removed. He a great x 4 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England. She a great x 4 granddaughter of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

[his father] Alfonso IV King Aragon and [his mother] Teresa Enteca Queen Consort Aragon were married. She by marriage Queen Consort Aragon. He the son of James "The Just" II King Aragon and Blanche Capet Queen Consort Aragon. He a great x 4 grandson of King Henry "Curtmantle" II of England.

Philip Ã‰vreux Count Longueville and Yolande Dampierre Countess of Bar were married. She the daughter of Robert Dampierre Count Marle and Joan Montfort. He the son of Philip "Noble" III King Navarre. They were second cousin once removed. He a great x 3 grandson of King Henry III of England. She a great x 2 granddaughter of King Henry III of England.

Gaston Phoebus Foix III Count Foix and Agnes Ã‰vreux Countess Foix were married. She by marriage Countess Foix. She the daughter of Philip "Noble" III King Navarre. He the son of Gaston Foix II Count Foix and Eleanore Comminges Countess Foix. She a great x 3 granddaughter of King Henry III of England.
